page.title: 07RICHMOND HILL SCHOOLS
page.content: Mr. Lee is the Caretaker of Richmond Hill First and Middle Schools.He has worked at Richmond Hill for 16 years. He works 39 hours a week plus overtime Mr Lee's busiest time of year is winter,when he has to operate the boilers usually used late September to early May.Fuel used is coal-singles. The floors are cleaned and polished every major holiday.The Headteacher of the First school is Mrs Alderson who has been Head for 1 year.There are 154 pupils and 5 classes.The School also has a Nursery. The Headteacher of the Middle school is Mr Loy who has been at the school for 8 years.The school is 32 years old.There are 210 pupils in the Middle School,and 8 classes.7 years ago there were 500 pupils and 19 classes,then Sprotbrough Copley Middle was opened. We think our schools are the best i Doncaster.
